auth.emailCodeHint: Enter the 6-digit code we sent to {{email}}.
auth.enterEmailBody: Please add an email address to continue.
auth.invalidEmailBody: Enter a valid email address to continue.
auth.emailCodeUnavailableBody: No email code factor is available for this user.
auth.signUpNeedsInfoBody: Clerk requires {{fields}} to finish sign-up. Update the Clerk sign-up requirements or collect these fields in-app.
auth.signUpNeedsInfoBodyGeneric: Clerk requires more info to finish sign-up. Update the Clerk sign-up requirements or collect additional fields.
auth.enterCodeBody: Check your email for the verification code.
auth.secondFactorBody: This account requires a second factor to finish sign-in.
auth.passwordResetBody: This account needs a password reset before it can sign in.
auth.verificationIncompleteBody: Try again or request a new code.
auth.codeAlreadyUsedBody: Request a new code and try again.
